name: Wizardish
description:
A first-person grid-based oldschool mini dungeon crawler inspired by Wizardry/Ultima, created in PICO-8. Controls are ARROWS+Z/X if you're not familiar with PICO-8 (and if you aren't, you should check it out!).

Featuring:

  • eight 16x16 dungeon floors
  • grid-based movement/turn-based combat system
  • automapping (hidden if you don't want it)
  • four selectable characters with various stats/perks
  • chests with gold, potions, and maybe a trap
  • sounds by me, music by 0xabad1dea
  • more stuff that i'm probably forgetting

If you're interested, feel free to read through the development process at https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=3585 as well as see detailed credits, old versions, and/or download the source code.
